name: Pumpkin Shooters
description:
This was a game jam project submitted to the spooktober game jam. It is the sequel to Pumpkin Smashers, a game I released last year. While pumpkin smashers is a stealth game, I decided to switch things up for the sequel.

Unlike Pumpkin Smashers, this game is action-packed with a fun and innovative experience. You upgrade your weapons, unlock different skins, destroy pumpkins, and more. 

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse - Shoot/Select

Space - Open the shop

Not a visual novel but oh well

NOTE: The game is much less buggy when downloaded. Gamemaker Studio has some HTML bugs so if you want a better experience then download.
